mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_user (id, password, nickname, name, taste, birth, email, social, gender, role) VALUES (#{id}, #{password}, #{nickName}, #{name}, #{taste}, #{birth}, #{email}, #{social}, #{gender}, #{role})
mapper.select: SELECT b.*, u.user_id AS userId, u.id AS userLoginId, u.name AS userName FROM tb_board b JOIN tb_user u ON b.user_id = u.user_id WHERE b.user_id = #{id} AND b.delete_date IS NULL ORDER BY b.create_date DESC
UPDATE tb_user SET nickname = #{nickName}, taste = #{taste}, email = #{email}, update_date = NOW() WHERE id = #{id};
